articles.title: New sleep study: Can you lose weight by sleeping? - Deseret News
articles.description: Can you lose weight when you’re asleep? A research study by a team from the University of Chicago published in JAMA Internal Medicine has found that increasing the number of hours you sleep can reduce your weight.
articles.content:
Getting more sleep each night can help you shed extra pounds, according to a new research study.
